website_summaries.verdict: An industrial, utilitarian look and a hefty size makes this perfect for serious entertaining.
pros: Two-shelf unit can easily hold an assortment of beverage buckets and bar accessories, and the tray design means nothing can roll off and break
Two locking swivel casters make it easy to maneuver
cons: If left outside without a cover, the trays can fill with water when it rains
It makes a lot of noise when being rolled along concrete

customer_reviews.title: Shiny & Stylish Party Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to add some storage to our front porch, with the idea that we can use it as needed indoors. I assembled it solo (strong enough mid-size, 30-something woman) without much bother. Took about 15 minutes, but that was just because I put the wrong wheels on two legs first (my mistake). The deep sides mean that it can store some rolling items (like my kid’s play items - soccer balls, digging tools, etc.), while it also displays party drinks in a stylish manner. It has some small imperfections — like a commercial-type item, so people who needs items to shine forever may take issue with that. For my family, it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Wanted  to totally love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a super great product. I wish I had absolutely no complaints about it because is so well built and appealing. The original one came so scratched up I had to complain. It was not right. The company was excellent and sent me another right away. The second Cart was Scratch but not as bad as the first. I decided to make the best of it and kept the cart.
customer_reviews.author: Patriotic purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Useful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Commercial grade, large and attractive. Locking wheels. Took off a Star bc it has a noticeable ding on the interior Lowe shelf. Otherwise perfect both in function and looks. Used beside the grill to hold the hamburgers and brauts, seasonings, and grill utensils. Like the deep walls that keep things inside. No fear of spills during transfer from house to grill! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dee clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Commerical Style Cart...
customer_reviews.text: I received this cart in time for 4th of July to put on my patio. The assembly was quick and easy. Although you need two people to assemble it properly. I placed on my patio and it looks great. Easy to push with the wheels and has heavy duty pans to place drink dispensers and wine bottles etc. I will use this over and over again for outdoor gatherings and possibly indoors
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional for a modern home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart to be able to keep my small collection of orchids hydrated near our dining room window. I wanted a stainless steel cart in which I could water and spray the plants without fear of rust. The cart arrived in a cardboard box and I was able to assemble it using the included tools and instructions in less than 15 minutes. It's prettier in person than one would expect, and seems sturdy and well made. I am pleased with this item as it serves its purpose well and looks good doing it.
customer_reviews.author: TheArtGrandTour

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, all-stainless, good casters.
customer_reviews.text: All stainless including bolts (excluding casters) and light weight. Assembly-notes: agree that the top tray should be attached first. The bolts for the lower tray also go thru the stems of the casters. The caster's stems are enclosed in square plastic spacers which may not have bolt-holes aligned ... inspect all casters and align the holes (sometimes difficult) in any needing it before attempting to assemble lower tray and (quality) casters. Also decide where to place the casters with locks. My cart is precisely what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: L. Schissler

customer_reviews.title: I'm still very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: After almost 9 months of (intensive) use, I'm still very happy with this product. Robust with a good look. We use it outside mainly. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: anneflo

customer_reviews.title: Well made.  Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what the description says - a commercial type cart that is well made and sturdy. Good wheels too.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Wathen

customer_reviews.title: Good product, assembly effort medium
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Assembly was a bit challenging, not all the holes line up perfectly when attaching the shelves to the rails. Recommend attaching the top shelf first, and then the bottom, since the wheel end of the rail is open and can be squeezed together easier to help align with the holes in the shelf. Haven't checked to see if it is water tight yet, plan to this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamming-Cool

customer_reviews.title: kinda cheep
customer_reviews.text: It works for the purpose we need it for. It is cheep and thin. Neither great, neither bad. Its fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Schnell

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible cart for the price. It makes a great grilling cart. High quality casters as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very useful patio cart.
customer_reviews.text: The cart was easy to assemble with the enclosed Allen wrench. It's perfect if you're looking for something that is utilitarian, holds a lot of stuff and rolls very easily. Best of all, it is reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: Found a use for it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be a serving cart for my kitchen, but it is too large. So I am keeping it in the garage and take it out to the car and load it with groceries and roll it back in. So it is useful for that. Meanwhile, I still need a serving cart. Oh, poo.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cart
customer_reviews.text: I like this cart a lot. it is sturdy and well made using high quality materials. It is easy to assemble and the company is responsive to problems. The first one I got had been dented in shipping and they replaced it quickly without any problems. My only observation is that the stainless trays are a little noisy so we fixed that by covering them with black rubberized shelf liners.
customer_reviews.author: Defense Lawyer

customer_reviews.title: Rugged
customer_reviews.text: Solid transport. A little clean up required to make it shine, but otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Barona

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is easy to sanitize
customer_reviews.text: Using as a cheese draining table. Works well and is easy to sanitize. My only complaint is it is VERY loud when you are rolling it along.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and very functional to pull items together in the kitchen and wheel out to the pool. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well but rattles a whole lot
customer_reviews.text: Nice large cart, but extremely noisy. I bought it for my kitchen, to set table and for cleanup. It is way too noisy to use when guests are around.
customer_reviews.author: PATUTI

customer_reviews.title: Metal thunder!
customer_reviews.text: Handy. Bigger than I expected. When empty it does that loud sheet metal popping sound like fake thunder. I use it. Well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndie

customer_reviews.title: So far it is holding up well and is very useful. Well made
customer_reviews.text: We have used this at a wedding venue for serving drinks the past two months. So far it is holding up well and is very useful. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tina G.

customer_reviews.title: but was a great
customer_reviews.text: It is a little tinny and makes some noise moving it, but was a great price
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Challenging assembly.
customer_reviews.text: The product is essentially as described, but it required 3 of us to put it together. This was because you have to apply a lot of force to fit the trays between the "legs," which came out of the box pre-shaped to be a lot more narrow that the space required to insert to trays in between them before securing them.
customer_reviews.author: TRL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for wheeling food from kitchen to outdoor patio, did line with hand towel to reduce noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hip idea for outdoor bar cart!
customer_reviews.text: We just finished our backyard pergola project. Bought this serving cart for drinks and appetizers when entertaining. Well made and much more attractive than most serving carts.
customer_reviews.author: lah

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is well built but the pans are pretty thin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its a great size. Purchased to use in church kitchen but has been utilized for many other uses. Light weight with sturdy wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: and very happy with both
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two carts, one for home and the other for outside entertaining,and very happy with both. The carts are very strong and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Liddy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outside
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves his father’s day gift! Was easy to put together and nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: alanna cole

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions misleading
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cart but the posted dimensions are incorrect - overall assembled height exceeds well over 30" when you take the wheels and handles into account, and full width is more than the width of the trays and should be clarified. A diagram showing actual height, depth, and width of the fully assembled cart would be helpful. We purchased to fit into a specific space below a counter but it was too tall and too wide.
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh “La Cart”
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. As some have mentioned, it is a bit “tinny” sounding. I just put on the underside of each bin a sound dampening thing used for cars. It is a cut to size and peel the backing item. For the price it is sufficient for me. I don’t need a marine grade cart that can carry tons of weight. Nice deep sides so things don’t fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

product_meta.title: Bayou Classic 4873 Stainless Steel Serving Cart
product_meta.description: Bayou Classic Stainless Serving Cart brings style and ease to parties by holding all entertaining essentials. The clean, understated design combines versatile beauty and durability. The two shelves can hold beverage buckets, garnish trays, ice buckets, glasses, bottles, mixers and pretty much anything else you can stuff on it. The cart features all stainless steel construction with swivel casters and two that lock. The large shelve measure in at 35 Inch long, 19.5 Inch wide and 4 Inch deep and it has push/pull handles at either side of the cart. The Bayou Classic Serving Cart is easily positioned from kitchen to patio for any party occasion. From casual to elegant entertaining, Bayou Classic understands the importance of presentation.
feature_bullets: Large stainless Steel trays 35"L x 19.5"W x 4"D

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars45 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
